resources.name: Hello World
resources.description: Welcome to my new blog built with Next.js and Vibe Coding.
resources.text:
# Hello World

Welcome to my new blog! This is a sample post to verify the setup.

## Features

- **Next.js SSG**: Fast and SEO friendly.
- **MDX**: Write content with components.
- **Tailwind CSS**: Beautiful styles.
- **Vibe Coding**: AI-assisted development.

Stay tuned for more updates!
